quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Percy Jackson and Series
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, percy, artemis. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who helped Theseus get out of the labyrinth?
How many fates are there according to Greek mythology?
Who is Rachel Elizabeth Dare according to the series Percy Jackson  the Olympians?

options.text: A mortal who can see through the mist
A spirit who guides Percy to the Underworld

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A mortal who can see through the mist

questions.question: Are Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades the Big Three gods according to the series Percy Jackson  the Olympians?
Who is Dolores Cartridge in the series Percy Jackson  the Olympians?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: There is no such character.

questions.question: In which book of the Percy Jackson  the Olympians series does Percy set out to find the Golden Fleece?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sea of Monsters

questions.question: What is the name of Percys first stepfather in Percy Jackson  the Olympians?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gabe Ugliano

questions.question: What is the name of Percys half brother in Percy Jackson  the Olympians?
Whose daughter is Silena in the series Percy Jackson  the Olympians?
Which of the following artists painted Ariadne Abandoned by Theseus?
In the series Percy Jackson  the Olympians, Lukes sword is called Backbiter.
What color is the hairbrush that Rachel throws at Luke(with Kronos inside him) ?
What do Demeter, Hades, Hera, Zeus, Poseidon, and Hestia have in common?

options.text: They all have thrones on Olympus.
They are all children of Kronos and Rhea.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are all children of Kronos and Rhea.

questions.question: Leto was the mother of Artemis and Apollo.
In Percy Jackson  the Olympians, Carter is Annabeths last name.

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Play and Shakespearean

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Beverly Hillbillies and Brunei
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, stars, g.k. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When did The Beverly Hillbillies air?
When was George Orwells novel 1984 published?
Name of Mr Drysdales step son on The Beverly Hillbillies who wanted to marry Elly?
Who played the beautiful Elly May Clampett on the TV show The Beverly Hillbillies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donna Douglas

questions.question: On January 1, 1984, the Southeast Asian country Brunei proclaimed to be a fully independent state after it regained independence from the United Kingdom. What is the state religion of Brunei?
Entrepreneur Mark Zuckerberg was born on May 14, 1984. What did he co-found with his classmates?
What team beat Spain 2-0 in the final of the 1984 UEFA European Football Championship, which was held in France?
Which one of the following soccer stars, who were all born in 1984, is not from Europe?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carlos Tevez

questions.question: In September 1984, Western Australia became the last Australian state to abolish capital punishment. When was it last used in the country?
In 1984, Joseph Kettinger became the first person to cross an ocean alone, in a hot air balloon. Which ocean did he cross?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Atlantic Ocean

questions.question: What famous dancer played Jed Clampett on the long-running TV show The Beverly Hillbillies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buddy Ebsen

questions.question: Phil Silvers was a guest star on the show The Beverly Hillbillies.

On November 9, 1984, Cesar Chavez, a Mexican American farmer and civil rights activist, made his Commonwealth Club address, What the Future Holds for Farm Workers and Hispanics. Where did he deliver his speech?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: San Francisco

questions.question: In 1984, this cleric and activist became the second South African to win the Nobel Peace Prize.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Desmond Tutu

questions.question: Apart from George Orwells novel 1984, which novel by G.K .Chesterton, is set in the year 1984?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Napoleon of Notting Hill
